item.title: Common lungwort (*Pulmonaria officinalis*)
item.description: Common lungwort is a medicinal plant that grows in spring and blooms in pink and purple colours. The tincture and tea from Pulmonaria officinalis are used to treat respiratory ailments, coughs and hoarseness.

item.title: Eastern purple coneflower (*Echinacea purpurea*)
item.description: Echinacea purpurea is a beautiful ornamental plant with proven effects on cough, flu, colds, and strengthening the immune system.
